Joy Of Performing (JOP) is a SaaS solution that catalyzes growth for organizations and people. JOP partners with organizations and leaders that are willing to break the old rules in search of superior performance. It helps companies to foster a working environment where employees and organizational teams perform at their best abilities and achieve desired results most effectively and efficiently. As a performance management tool, JOP enables organizations to create and measure goaltives and Key Results, and develop processes for measuring performance.  JOP helps employees understand where they fit into the larger scheme of the company’s vision, mission and goals, and how their work impacts the company’s overall success. 

JOP is widely used by organizations to adjust workflow, adapt to the changes in the market, and get better at decision making, ensuring organization and their employees thrive consistently. In turn, this helps the organization in achieving all of its desired objectives optimally. We understand that goals are achieved through cross functional collaboration and allow space for that, while at the same time encouraging clear ownership and accountability for performance. The loop is closed by offering a dedicated dashboard for bidirectional feedback to be exchanged among individuals, colleagues, and managers. 

Being an agile performance management tool, it ensures individuals are assessed for the results they achieve and saves time on lengthy year end reviews by supporting performance conversations centered around the objectives furthered by individuals’ work.  

This makes the organizations focus on accountability, and hence they enjoy a healthier, more transparent work environment that revolves around enhanced communication. Even before implementation, customers respond to the JOP Index questionnaire which benchmarks the current state of the organization’s performance culture. We run this test periodically to assess the effectiveness of JOP’s offering.
Being an effective performance management program, JOP does it all for the organization:

1. Aligning employees’ activities with the organization's vision and mission
2. Developing specific job-performance objectives and outcomes
3. Fostering a high-performance culture 
4. Check-ins to reflect upon progress and mitigate performance issues
5. Continuous feedback which allows colleagues and managers to give real time input on each others’ performance
6. System generated analytics on the performance of individuals, teams, and thus the company as a whole

Today’s Graduate Recruitment Challenges The Early Career recruitment landscape is rapidly evolving, with businesses seeking innovative methods to attract and understand the Gen Z talent pool. Traditional CVs often fail to capture the true essence of a candidate, leading to a mismatch in skills and company culture, which is further exacerbated by the volume of applications and the need for a diverse workforce. It is also increasingly difficult for businesses to stand out to applicanhere we come in.

Introducing Vizzy

Vizzy is a state-of-the-art recruitment talent technology platform that revolutionises the Early Careers hiring process. Unlike conventional methods, Vizzy delivers stand-out application processes and provides a dynamic professional summary, offering a 360-degree view of a candidate's potential beyond the conventional CV. Our technology is designed to align with the shift towards more holistic hiring and the Gen Z expectation for engaging, digital-first recruitment processes.

How It Works

Vizzy helps businesses deliver brand aligned application processes to stand out from the crowd and attract a wider talent audience than usual.  Vizzy invites candidates to create an engaging professional profile that showcases their motivations, personality, skills, and attitudes through an intuitive and enjoyable interface. Employers are then equipped with deeper insights that better inform hiring decisions and inform wider parts of the business. Vizzy’s turns candidate insights into consumer insights delivering value from those hired and not hired, informing marketing, product and beyond.

Key Benefits

At a strategic level, Vizzy helps businesses stand out from the crowd in a busy and competitive market where attracting top early career talent is paramount. On a functional level Vizzy enables businesses to tap into a wider talent pool, mitigate unconscious bias, and enhance their employer brand appeal by offering a modern, inclusive, and candidate-friendly application experience. Our clients have observed improved candidate quality (often hiring more than planned, leading to higher retention rates and a workforce that resonates with their corporate values. Beyond this they gain notoriety as an employer who use a technology that resonates with the next generation of talent, speaking to them as they want to be at a crucial point in their career journey.

 Our campus recruitment track record
 

 Over 10,000 Companies and colleges

 Implement hassle-free remote campus hiring  
 

 Complete process automation
 

 Harness the power of workflow automation. Our AI-powered campus hiring workflows is the sole platform that facilitates an end-to-end remote college hiring experience. Built in collaboration with industry experts, the platform is tailor-made to handle high-volume campus recruitment. Its user-friendly and intuitive interface provides easy access and a smooth user experience to all the stakeholders involved in the hiring process, from officers, candidates, and recruiters to event managers, hiring managers, interviewers, and the HR operations team.
 

 AI-powered remote automation for enhanced speed and accuracy
 

 Bring speed and precision to your remote university hiring workflows with advanced automation. Our AI-driven platform allows you to upload and store candidate profiles in a digital repository and host online registrations. Accelerate your campus hiring process with features such as automated eligibility check, error-free admit card generation and verification and reliable assessment shortlisting. 
 

 Our automated platform eliminates the hassle of scheduling interviews and managing personalised feedback. Go paperless with digitised document collection and release letters of intent (LOIs) and roll-out offers at the click of a button. 
 

 Fraud-proof and frictionless assessments and interviews 
 

 Conduct high integrity AI-driven assessments. Our platform helps you automatically identify fraudulent behaviour through its AI-powered impersonation and multiple people detection features. You can flag cheating incidents through accurate plagiarism reports and code playback. 
 

 Effectively monitor and control fraudulent behaviour with AI-powered live proctoring, automated warnings and instant disqualification. Prevent suspicious activity with additional features such as question randomisation and auto-expiration, secure browser and complete access control with time, IP and browser. 
 

 Seamless and positive candidate experience
 

 Optimise processes and procedures for a superior candidate experience. Our platform allows digital registration, invitation management and digital admit card verification. AI-enabled automated status communication helps interviewers schedule and manage slots while incorporating branch diversity and gender mix. Our help desk support feature enables you to efficiently address candidates’ post-offer queries.  
 

 Simplified virtual onboarding

 Our platform helps you achieve complete automation of candidate engagement through prompt status communication via email and SMS. Our help desk support addresses candidates’ queries round-the-clock. 
 

 Granular analytics and customised reports

Efficiently analyse campus hiring data with features that help track events, analyse stage-wise conversion and understand stage-wise gender mix. Our platform also provides detailed interviewer and assessments analytics, categorised by college type, college, degree, branch or CGPA. 
 

 Robust security and compliance
 

 Attain maximum security with our ISO 27001-certified and GDPR-compliant platform. We host all customer data on Amazon Web Services (AWS) and use strong password policies to control data access. Based on the contract or on request, the data collected can be deleted or extracted. We encrypt personally identifiable information at rest and encrypt data transfers using https or ssh. We also maintain detailed audit trails and logs for all activities.

15.ABOUT:
To create a truly inclusive workplace, every individual must be given the tools and environment that allow them to learn and grow. Crescendo makes it possible to scale your inclusion strategy worldwide and realize your DEI commitment year-round. With microlearning in the flow of work, our platform incrementally nudges your people towards better DEI practices, increasing the potential of your whole organization. As your people learn, our analytics engine raises valuable insights aboutg state of inclusion at your company so that you can see the impact of your DEI initiatives.

As both workforces and consumers diversify, Crescendo helps companies stay ahead of change and build cultural competence and build cultural competence. This allows them to foster inclusive workplaces and deliver memorable and culturally-relevant experiences to customers. Crescendo enables busy companies to keep their DEI efforts global and relevant, monitor and measure inclusive action, and bring sustainable, tailored, and long-term growth to their employees.

Fortune 500 companies rely on Crescendo to scale their inclusion strategies, reducing the burden on their DEI, HR and People teams. Let Crescendo take on the repetitive and time-consuming tasks of global DEI education, so your people can focus on the areas where they are uniquely needed: the human elements.

Our rich analytics platform raises insights so you can measure change in inclusive action as your workforce learns through Crescendo. We provide the metrics needed to adeptly allocate resources and keep up with the flowing nature of your people and DEI programs. Go beyond one-off training and integrate inclusion microlearning into your day-to-day with measurable, impactful results, driven by data.

Our easy-to-integrate software empowers global teams to learn fluidly, scale globally, and grow together like never before. Our platform is used by over 35,000 employees at more than 30 leading international companies, including Indeed, Remitly, ServiceNow, InVision and Conde Nast.

Your inclusion strategy shouldn’t be an afterthought; keep inclusion top-of-mind year-round with weekly nudges and personalized learning paths, meeting every individual where they are on their learning journey. Crescendo brings the learning to you. Get ready to grow, globally!

9.PRODUCT_NAME: DTSMS - Drug Testing Software Management Suite
9.ABOUT:
• The software allows for a random selection of an exact number of employees or by a percent of the available employee pool. • The software allows for a large enough number of tests per county agency/group that can be tracked. The number is large enough to handle all of the agencies/groups either combined or separately • The software uses a non-identifiable key for employee identification (i.e., no SSN). The software can use employee id from our HR software (Advantage HR). • The softomate the notification of tests to HR Managers.
•	The software allows for the tracking and retaining of all testing notifications.
•	The software produces a report identifying those employees required to report for testing, including the date of the test, to allow for manual notification.
•	The software allows multiple roles within the application (i.e., administrator, selector, view only) with various staff members within each function, with appropriate security for each role.
•	The software performs randomization in an industry acceptable manner that is legally defendable if necessary.
•	The software provides reports or data for ad hoc reports to verify required testing rates for a select group of the testing completed. Examples of these subsets would be for a government reporting agency (i.e., FMCSA, DOT, etc.) or to verify union agreements - only random tests. The software allows for the modification of the testing rates or percentages for the government agencies.
•	Software legal identification of any incident allows for the retention of records indefinitely when a claim has been placed against the County, Agency, or an Employee.
•	The software allows for an employee to be flagged if they are out on extended leave’(usually > 30 days).  
•	The software allows for the selection pool for a random test to be a specific shift/group (i.e., A, B, C, or D). The software will enable employees to be selected for different test types (i.e. Drugs, Alcohol or Both).
•	 The software allows for the selection pool for a random test to be based on job function (i.e. safety-sensitive positions).
•	The software allows for the selection pool for a random test to be based on government requirements (i.e. separate pools for FTA or FMCSA).

7.ABOUT:
For most organizations dealing with large populations of contractors, the task of assuring contract compliance is daunting. There just aren’t enough people to properly control the workforce. Supervisors are stretched too thin and barely have time to initial the timesheets or approve an email. Approvals are given just so vendors can get paid. No time or upfront business processes exist to see if the terms of the contract are being followed. Time administrators and supervisors for bothnd contractor don't know if terms covering over-time, double-time, craft and skills matching, hourly rates and more are being followed. Lack of ability to enforce contract compliance is a second root cause of overpayment in manufacturing companies.
 

 Track automates contract compliance. It keeps an electronic version of the terms and conditions in the database and applies those to the hours captured during the shift. Exceptions are highlighted and not processed automatically until a supervisor reviews and approves them.
 

 Track enforces a best practice of allocating 100% of contract labor hours, regardless of whether the contract is T&M, Lump Sum, or Unit Rate. Allocating 100% of labor hours ensures that costs are not allocated twice and provides an excellent work history. The historical data of actual effort for specific projects becomes invaluable information when planning future works. It is easier to choose what type of contract to use for specific projects when there is a clear understanding of the actual effort required to complete the project.
